00019 using Gtk;
00020 
00021 using System;
00022 using System.Threading;
00023 
00024 using Niry;
00025 using Niry.Utils;
00026 using Niry.Network;
00027 using Niry.GUI.Gtk2;
00028 
00029 using NyFolder;
00030 using NyFolder.Utils;
00031 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00032 using NyFolder.PluginLib;
00033 
00034 namespace NyFolder {
00035     public class NyFolderMain {
00036         // ============================================
00037         // PRIVATE STATIC Members
00038         // ============================================
00039         private static P2PManager p2pManager = null;
00040         private static NyFolderApp nyFolder = null;
00041 
00042         // ============================================
00043         // PRIVATE STATIC Methods
00044         // ============================================
00046         private static void InitBase() {
00047             // Initialize NyFolder Paths
00048             Debug.Log("Initializing NyFolder Paths...");
00049             Paths.Initialize();
00050 
00051             // Set Home Directory as Current Environment Path
00052             Debug.Log("Setting Current Environment Path...");
00053             Environment.CurrentDirectory = Paths.HomeDirectory;
00054 
00055             // Initialize Proxy Settings
00056             Debug.Log("Initializing Proxy Settings...");
00057             Proxy.Initialize();
00058 
00059             // Initialize (Gtk GUI) Stock Icons
00060             Debug.Log("Initializing Stock Icons...");
00061             GUI.StockIcons.Initialize();
00062         }
00063 
00065         private static void InitNetwork() {
00066             // Initialize P2PManager
00067             Debug.Log("Initializing P2P Manager...");
00068             p2pManager = P2PManager.GetInstance();
00069 
00070             // Initialize Command Manager
00071             Debug.Log("Initializing Protocol Manager...");
00072             CmdManager.Initialize();
00073 
00074             // Initialize Download Manager
00075             Debug.Log("Initializing Download Manager...");
00076             DownloadManager.Initialize();
00077 
00078             // Initialize Upload Manager
00079             Debug.Log("Initializing Upload Manager...");
00080             UploadManager.Initialize();
00081         }
00082 
00084         private static void InitApplication() {
00085             // Initialize NyFolder Application
00086             Debug.Log("Initializing NyFolder...");
00087             nyFolder = new NyFolderApp();
00088             nyFolder.Initialize();
00089 
00090             // Initialize Plugins
00091             Debug.Log("Initializing NyFolder Plugins...");
00092             PluginManager.Initialize(nyFolder);
00093 
00094             // Start Plugins
00095             Debug.Log("Starting NyFolder Plugins...");
00096             PluginManager.RunPlugins();
00097         }
00098 
00099         // ============================================
00100         //             APPLICATION MAIN
00101         // ============================================
00102         public static int Main (string[] args) {
00103             // Starting Application
00104             Debug.Log("{0} {1} Started...", Info.Name, Info.Version);
00105 
00106             do {
00107                 p2pManager = null;
00108                 nyFolder = null;
00109 
00110                 // Initialize Gtk Support
00111                 if (Gtk.Application.InitCheck("NyFolder.exe", ref args) == false) {
00112                     PrintErrorMessage("You Don't Have Gtk Support Here...");
00113                     return(1);
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 // Initialize Components
00117                 InitBase();
00118                 InitNetwork();
00119                 InitApplication();
00120 
00121                 try {
00122                     // Set 'No Restart' Application
00123                     NyFolderApp.Restart = false;
00124 
00125                     // Run NyFolder Application
00126                     nyFolder.Run();
00127 
00128                     // Run Gtk Main
00129                     Gtk.Application.Run();
00130                 } catch (NyFolderExit) {
00131                     // This is Logout Event :D
00132                     NyFolderApp.Restart = true;
00133                 } catch (Exception e) {
00134                     PrintErrorMessage(e);
00135                     return(1);
00136                 } finally {
00137                     // Uninitialize Plugins
00138                     PluginManager.StopPlugins();
00139 
00140                     // Clear Download/Upload Manager
00141                     UploadManager.Clear();
00142                     DownloadManager.Clear();
00143 
00144                     // Destroy All P2P Connections
00145                     if (p2pManager != null) p2pManager.Kill();
00146 
00147                     // NyFolder Quit Application
00148                     if (NyFolderApp.Restart == false && nyFolder != null)
00149                         nyFolder.Quit();
00150                 }
00151                 Thread.Sleep(1000);
00152             } while (NyFolderApp.Restart == true);
00153 
00154             // Application Correct Termination
00155             Debug.Log("{0} {1} Ended...", Info.Name, Info.Version);
00156             return(0);
00157         }
00158 
00159         private static void PrintErrorHeader() {
00160             Console.WriteLine(@"    _______         ___________    .__       .___");
00161             Console.WriteLine(@"    \      \ ___.__.\_   _____/___ |  |    __| _/___________");
00162             Console.WriteLine(@"    /   |   <   |  | |    __)/  _ \|  |   / __ |/ __ \_  __ \");
00163             Console.WriteLine(@"   /    |    \___  | |     \(  <_> )  |__/ /_/ \  ___/|  | \/");
00164             Console.WriteLine(@"   \____|__  / ____| \___  / \____/|____/\____ |\___  >__|   ");
00165             Console.WriteLine(@"           \/\/          \/ {0} Error       \/    \/", Info.Version);
00166             Console.WriteLine("==================================================================");
00167             Console.WriteLine("Compiler: {0}", Info.Compiler);
00168             Console.WriteLine("OS Version:  {0}", Environment.OSVersion.Version);
00169             Console.WriteLine("OS Platform: {0}", Environment.OSVersion.Platform);
00170             Console.WriteLine("==================================================================");
00171         }
00172 
00173         private static void PrintException (Exception e) {
00174             Console.WriteLine("Type:     {0}", e.GetType());
00175             Console.WriteLine("Source:   {0}", e.Source);
00176             Console.WriteLine("Message:  {0}", e.Message);
00177             Console.WriteLine("Stack Trace:");
00178             Console.WriteLine(e.StackTrace);
00179         }
00180 
00181         private static void PrintErrorFooter() {
00182             Console.WriteLine("==================================================================");
00183             Console.WriteLine("Please, Report Bug(s) To Matteo Bertozzi <theo.bertozzi@gmail.com>");
00184         }
00185 
00186         private static void PrintErrorMessage (Exception e) {
00187             PrintErrorHeader();
00188             PrintException(e);
00189             PrintErrorFooter();
00190         }
00191 
00192         private static void PrintErrorMessage (string message) {
00193             PrintErrorHeader();
00194             Console.WriteLine(message);
00195             PrintErrorFooter();
00196         }
00197     }
00198 }
